1.content:
In the world where anyone can have any pokemon some rich men thought that they want unique pokemon for themself and hatched a plan.

Every girl of age can be obtained and enslaved.

Now it's time to begin....

1152.content: How about a group of girls are captured ?
1152.title: no, other choices

11521.content:
Delia was having a lunch in with many of her son's friends and mothers. Right now her living room was somewhat crowded, as Misty, Serena, Grace ( Serena's mother), May, Caroline ( May's mother), Dawn, Johanna ( Dawn's mother), Anabel, Korrina, Gielle, Angie, Emlyn ( Angie's mother), Lillie and Lusamine ( Lillie's mother) where around her coffee table. They where all enjoying some food she made and having some small talk.

Unbeknownst to the ground of beauties, a group of men surrounded Delia's house. They had orders to capture each girl unharmed and bring them to back to their master. Luckily the women where completely unaware of them. So the pumped sleeping gas into the house. Soon all the girls where fast asleep. The men entered and carried each women out of the house and into a near by van.

What happened next ?

Option 1: Show the girls being transported.

Option 2: Skip to the girls waking up in a cell.
11521.title: The more the merrier
